text:
Splunk | Senior Software Engineer | San Francisco | Full Time | Onsite

I'm hiring full stack engineers for my team at our SF HQ. You'll have the opportunity to have significant impact on newly announced cloud based products. Golang, Python, or C++ highly preferred along with Machine Learning experience -- but we welcome all skills as long as you're motivated and eager. Currently, I'm only looking for senior engineers with a minimum of 4 years of experience. Shoot me an email -- the address is in my profile!
